# subitems

**Instance Property**

An array of the items contained in the group.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var subitems: [NSCollectionLayoutItem] { get }
```

## Getting the group’s items

- **supplementaryItems**: An array of the supplementary items that are anchored to the group.

items.description: An array of the supplementary items that are anchored to the group.
items.name: supplementaryItems
